my daughter works for the government, she has all kinds of guns, all i got =
 
is this big mutt dog out here, guess, I should learn how to use a gun too=
.  
 I don't like them though.  I live in the woods, maybe they won't even =
see  
this place, only close neighbors will know where I live. sf
 
 
In a =
message dated 3/6/2011 10:38:22 A.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
SnowfireL@aol=
.com writes:

 
 
 
True, but if I wasn't here other's might get the benefi=
t of whatever was  
left over, you are right, there probably would be the r=
oving gangs, we have  
that now, on TV whenever there is trouble, they star=
t braking the windows of 
 business's feeling they have the license to stea=
l.  sf
 
 
In a message dated 3/6/2011 10:20:43 A.M. Eastern Standard Time,=
  
raggedyann8140@... writes:

 
". So, stock up on canned food if yo=
u can guys, enough to last  for 
> at least a year or 2, I buy mine a few e=
xtra at a time,  and if you are 
> translated over, the food will be there =
for  some one else that gets 
stuck here 
> for that near 3 years. I  keep =
"
 
Unfortunately, if this does happen SF, you won't have the  oppourtunity=
 use 
your supplies as
there will be roving gangs with guns taking whatever=
 they  want.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 


IS THIS WHERE YOU LIVE? 
"No, I live in heaven=
, and my  affections
are there. I just borrow this shack while
waiting for =
 my ride home."

--- On Sun, 3/6/11, Snowfire Lioness  <SnowfireL@...> =
wrote:

Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC=

ay, March 6, 2011, 1:04  AM


 
 
to  "translate" means to change, i looked=
 up the word, as in a different  
language in order to understand a differe=
nt language we must  translate it, 
I'm really not sure what it means to ha=
ppen, I think  we just vanish on this 
side, and appear on their side, some=
  how.  another dimension? maybe. sf

cks,

continue, it 
>  seems they will all return after about 2 or 3 years or so =
after the  
permanent 
> return of Christ to this world, this will occur  a=
fter the antichrist has 
> all but destroyed all life, but JC  will come ba=
ck, and stop him." David 
says 
> that "the entire  animal population may b=
e nearly wiped out before Christ 
>  returns," things are going to only get=
 worse," right now we are all  
living 
> in this bubble, thinking it won't=
 happen.
>  
> It's very sad, I still can't get David to tell me who it is =
 that killing 
> the creatures, he only says they will all be  brought back=
 to earth after 
JC's 
> return. So, stock up on  canned food if you can gu=
ys, enough to last for 
> at least a  year or 2, I buy mine a few extra at =
a time, and if you are 
>  translated over, the food will be there for some=
 one else that gets  
stuck here 
> for that near 3 years. I keep hoping to=
 win the  lotto, like everyone 
else, 
> then I would put lots of food in  =
here for people so, they don't starve. 
I 
> have the lake down  here, our =
water is from a natural artesian spring 
> water, it  is 250 feet deep so, =
it's pretty safe to drink. And even if I 
lost  
> electricity, one could a=
lways get some water, from the lake  out there 
which 
> is private too. If=
 I leave, anyone stuck  here is welcome to come over 
here 
> to live, but =
you will  need to probably keep up with the mortgage if 
there 
> is  still=
 the bank left. Whatever, it's going to be pretty bad from what  
I 
> hear=
. sf
